title: instances‚Äã
content: Type: Array A array that saves all player instances, and can manage multiple instances through this property when multiple players exist at the same time. ‚ñ∂ Run Code var art = new Artplayer({ container: '.artplayer-app', url: '/assets/sample/video.mp4', }); art.on('ready', () => { console.info(Artplayer.instances); });

title: version‚Äã
content: Type: String Current player version number ‚ñ∂ Run Code console.info(Artplayer.version);

title: env‚Äã
content: Type: String Current player environment variable ‚ñ∂ Run Code console.info(Artplayer.env);

title: utils‚Äã
content: Type: Object Common utils for player ‚ñ∂ Run Code console.info(Artplayer.utils);

title: config‚Äã
content: Type: Object Store native properties and methods of video ‚ñ∂ Run Code console.info(Artplayer.config);

title: scheme‚Äã
content: Type: Object Verification scheme for player option ‚ñ∂ Run Code console.info(Artplayer.scheme);

title: validator‚Äã
content: Type: Function Validator for player option

title: option‚Äã
content: Type: Object Player default option ‚ñ∂ Run Code console.info(Artplayer.option);

title: html‚Äã
content: Type: String Player defaults HTML String, usually used for SSR ‚ñ∂ Run Code console.info(Artplayer.html);

title: kindOf‚Äã
content: Type: Function JS type identification function ‚ñ∂ Run Code console.info(Artplayer.kindOf('0')); console.info(Artplayer.kindOf(0)); console.info(Artplayer.kindOf({})); console.info(Artplayer.kindOf([]));

title: Add button to the controls
content: Add button to the controls ‚ñ∂ Run Code var time = 0; var art = new Artplayer({ container: '.artplayer-app', url: '/assets/sample/video.mp4', controls: [ { position: 'right', html: '<button type="button">Click Me!</button>', click: function (_, event) { // The second parameter is an event object time += 1; event.target.innerText = 'You Click ' + time; }, }, ], });

title: Demo‚Äã
content: üëâ View Demo

title: Install from npm:‚Äã
content: $ npm install artplayer-plugin-ads

title: Install from yarn:‚Äã
content: $ yarn add artplayer-plugin-ads

title: Install from script:‚Äã
content: <!-- local --> <script src="path/to/artplayer-plugin-ads.js"></script> <!-- jsdelivr --> <script src="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/artplayer-plugin-ads/dist/artplayer-plugin-ads.js"></script> <!-- unpkg --> <script src="https://unpkg.com/artplayer-plugin-ads/dist/artplayer-plugin-ads.js"></script>  Then you can access the plugin function through window.artplayerPluginAds

title: Use‚Äã
content: ‚ñ∂ Run Code var art = new Artplayer({ container: '.artplayer-app', url: '/assets/sample/video.mp4', autoSize: true, fullscreen: true, fullscreenWeb: true, plugins: [ artplayerPluginAds({ // html ad, ignore this value if it is a video ad html: '<img src="/assets/sample/poster.jpg">', // The address of the video ad video: '/assets/sample/test1.mp4', // Ad redirect URL, if empty, no redirect url: 'http://artplayer.org', // The length of time that must be watched, the period cannot be skipped, the unit is seconds // When the value is greater than or equal to totalDuration, the ad cannot be closed early // When the value is equal to or less than 0, the ad can be turned off at any time playDuration: 5, // The total duration of the ad, in seconds totalDuration: 10, // Whether the video ads defaults to silence muted: false, // Multilingual support i18n: { close: 'Close Ads', countdown: '%s seconds', detail: 'Check Detail', canBeClosed: 'Ads can be closed after %s seconds', }, }), ], }); art.on('artplayerPluginAds:click', (ads) => { console.info('ad is clicked', ads); }); art.on('artplayerPluginAds:skip', (ads) => { console.info('Ads are skipped', ads); });

title: Handle a single component
content: Handle a single component When we add custom components in layers, contextmenu, controls, It is best to add a name property that is used to position the DOM element of the component. Here are three ways to get the DOM element of the component: component method mounted, instance method query, recommended through name direct acquisition. ‚ñ∂ Run Code var art = new Artplayer({ container: '.artplayer-app', url: '/assets/sample/video.mp4', setting: true, }); art.on('ready', () => { art.layers.add({ name: 'layer1', html: 'your-layer', mounted: function($layer1) { // } }); art.contextmenu.add({ name: 'contextmenu1', html: 'your-contextmenu', mounted: function($contextmenu1) { // } }); art.controls.add({ name: 'control1', html: 'your-control', position: 'right', mounted: function($control1) { // } }); // Use the query method to get the DOM element of the component var $layer1 = art.query('.art-layer-layer1'); var $contextmenu1 = art.query('.art-contextmenu-contextmenu1'); var $control1 = art.query('.art-control-control1'); // Recommended use the name to get the DOM element of the component var $layer1 = art.layers['layer1']; var $contextmenu1 = art.contextmenu['contextmenu1']; var $control1 = art.controls['control1']; }); ÊèêÁ§∫ Note that you can't create components with the same name

title: How to import types
content: How to import types Sometimes you lose TypeScript syntax prompt, then you can import types manually /** * @typedef { import("artplayer/types/artplayer") } Artplayer */ /** * @type {Artplayer} - An Artplayer instance. */ const art1 = {}; /** * @param {Artplayer} art2 - An Artplayer instance. */ function getInstance(art2) { // }

title: Use with React Portal
content: Use with React Portal It is also very easy to use React Components in layers, contextmenu, controls. Handle more complex logic through ReactDOM.createPortal. üëâ Click to open an online demo import React, { useState, useEffect } from "react"; import ReactDOM, { createPortal } from "react-dom"; import Artplayer from "artplayer/examples/react/Artplayer"; function Timer({ time }) { return <div>{time}</div>; } function App() { const [art, setArt] = useState(null); const [time, setTime] = useState(0); useEffect(() => { const update = () => setTime((time) => time + 1); setInterval(update, 1000); }, []); return ( <div> <Artplayer option={{ url: "https://artplayer.org/assets/sample/video.mp4", layers: [ { html: "", name: "portal" } ], controls: [ { position: "right", name: "portal", html: "" } ] }} style={{ width: "600px", height: "400px", margin: "60px auto 0" }} getInstance={(art) => { art.on("ready", () => setArt(art)); }} /> {art ? createPortal(<Timer time={time} />, art.layers.portal) : null} {art ? createPortal(<Timer time={time} />, art.controls.portal) : null} </div> ); } const rootElement = document.getElementById("root"); ReactDOM.render(<App />, rootElement);

title: flv.js‚Äã
content: Homepage: https://github.com/Bilibili/flv.js ‚ñ∂ Run Code var art = new Artplayer({ container: '.artplayer-app', autoplay: true, url: '/assets/sample/video.flv', customType: { flv: function (video, url) { if (flvjs.isSupported()) { const flvPlayer = flvjs.createPlayer({ type: 'flv', url: url, }); flvPlayer.attachMediaElement(video); flvPlayer.load(); } else { art.notice.show = 'Does not support playback of flv'; } }, }, });

title: hls.js‚Äã
content: Homepage: https://github.com/video-dev/hls.js ‚ñ∂ Run Code var art = new Artplayer({ container: '.artplayer-app', autoplay: true, url: 'https://test-streams.mux.dev/x36xhzz/x36xhzz.m3u8', customType: { m3u8: function (video, url) { if (Hls.isSupported()) { const hls = new Hls(); hls.loadSource(url); hls.attachMedia(video); } else { const canPlay = video.canPlayType('application/vnd.apple.mpegurl'); if (canPlay === 'probably' || canPlay === 'maybe') { video.src = url; } else { art.notice.show = 'Does not support playback of m3u8'; } } }, }, });

title: dash.js‚Äã
content: Homepage: https://github.com/Dash-Industry-Forum/dash.js ‚ñ∂ Run Code var art = new Artplayer({ container: '.artplayer-app', autoplay: true, url: 'https://dash.akamaized.net/envivio/EnvivioDash3/manifest.mpd', customType: { mpd: function (video, url) { var player = dashjs.MediaPlayer().create(); player.initialize(video, url, true); }, }, });

title: shaka-player‚Äã
content: Homepage: https://github.com/google/shaka-player ‚ñ∂ Run Code var art = new Artplayer({ container: '.artplayer-app', autoplay: true, url: '//storage.googleapis.com/shaka-demo-assets/angel-one/dash.mpd', customType: { mpd: function (video, url) { shaka.polyfill.installAll(); var player = new shaka.Player(video); player.load(url); }, }, });

title: webtorrent‚Äã
content: Homepage: https://github.com/webtorrent/webtorrent ‚ñ∂ Run Code var art = new Artplayer({ container: '.artplayer-app', autoplay: true, url: 'magnet:?xt=urn:btih:6a9759bffd5c0af65319979fb7832189f4f3c35d&dn=sintel.mp4&tr=wss%3A%2F%2Ftracker.btorrent.xyz&tr=wss%3A%2F%2Ftracker.fastcast.nz&tr=wss%3A%2F%2Ftracker.openwebtorrent.com&tr=wss%3A%2F%2Ftracker.webtorrent.io&ws=https%3A%2F%2Fwebtorrent.io%2Ftorrents%2Fsintel-1024-surround.mp4', type: 'torrent', customType: { torrent: function (video, url, art) { var client = new WebTorrent(); art.loading.show = true; client.add(url, function (torrent) { var file = torrent.files[0]; file.renderTo(video, { autoplay: true, }); }); }, }, }); art.on('ready', () => { art.template.$video.controls = false; });

title: Add selector list‚Äã
content: Settings panels are similar to a collection of list selections, and support multi-layer nested Property	Type	Descriptionhtml	String„ÄÅElement	DOM elements of selector icon	String„ÄÅElement	Icon of selector selector	Array	Selector list onSelect	Function	Selector click event width	Number	Panel width default	Boolean	Default selected tooltip	String	Tooltip text ‚ñ∂ Run Code var art = new Artplayer({ container: '.artplayer-app', url: '/assets/sample/video.mp4', setting: true, flip: true, playbackRate: true, aspectRatio: true, settings: [ { html: 'Select Subtitle', width: 250, tooltip: 'Subtitle 01', selector: [ { default: true, html: '<span style="color:red">Subtitle 01</span>', url: '/assets/sample/subtitle.srt?id=1', }, { html: '<span style="color:yellow">Subtitle 02</span>', url: '/assets/sample/subtitle.srt?id=2', }, ], onSelect: function (item, $dom, event) { console.info(item, $dom, event); art.subtitle.url = item.url; // Change the tooltip return item.html; }, }, { html: 'Select Quality', width: 150, tooltip: '1080P', selector: [ { default: true, html: '1080P', url: '/assets/sample/video.mp4?id=1080', }, { html: '720P', url: '/assets/sample/video.mp4?id=720', }, { html: '360P', url: '/assets/sample/video.mp4?id=360', }, ], onSelect: function (item, $dom, event) { console.info(item, $dom, event); art.switchQuality(item.url, item.html); // Change the tooltip return item.html; }, }, { html: 'Multi-layer nested', selector: [ { html: 'Nested 01', selector: [ { html: 'Nested 02', }, { html: 'Nested 02', }, ], }, { html: 'Nested 01', selector: [ { html: 'Nested 02', }, { html: 'Nested 02', }, ], }, ], }, ], });

title: Add switch button‚Äã
content: Property	Type	Descriptionhtml	String„ÄÅElement	DOM elements of selector icon	String„ÄÅElement	Icon of selector switch	Boolean	Button default state onSwitch	Function	Button toggle event tooltip	String	Tooltip text ‚ñ∂ Run Code var art = new Artplayer({ container: '.artplayer-app', url: '/assets/sample/video.mp4', setting: true, flip: true, playbackRate: true, aspectRatio: true, settings: [ { html: 'PIP Mode', tooltip: 'OFF', icon: '<img width="22" heigth="22" src="/assets/img/state.svg">', switch: false, onSwitch: function (item, $dom, event) { console.info(item, $dom, event); const nextState = !item.switch; art.pip = nextState; // Change the tooltip item.tooltip = nextState ? 'ON' : 'OFF'; // Change the switch state return nextState; }, }, { html: 'Use with selector', width: 200, selector: [ { default: true, html: 'Setting 01', }, { html: 'Setting 02', }, { html: 'Setting 03', switch: false, onSwitch: function (item, $dom, event) { return !item.switch; }, }, { html: 'Setting 04', icon: '', switch: true, onSwitch: function (item, $dom, event) { return !item.switch; }, }, ], onSelect: function (item) { return item.html; }, }, ], });

title: Add range slider‚Äã
content: Property	Type	Descriptionhtml	String„ÄÅElement	DOM elements of selector icon	String„ÄÅElement	Icon of selector range	Array	Range default state onRange	Function	Range change event tooltip	String	Tooltip text const range = [5, 1, 10, 1]; const value = range[0]; const min = range[1]; const max = range[2]; const step = range[3];  ‚ñ∂ Run Code var art = new Artplayer({ container: '.artplayer-app', url: '/assets/sample/video.mp4', setting: true, flip: true, playbackRate: true, aspectRatio: true, settings: [ { html: 'Range', tooltip: '5x', icon: '<img width="22" heigth="22" src="/assets/img/state.svg">', range: [5, 1, 10, 1], onRange: function (item) { // Change the tooltip return item.range + 'x'; }, }, { html: 'Use with selector', width: 240, selector: [ { default: true, html: 'Setting 01', }, { html: 'Setting 02', }, { html: 'Setting 03', tooltip: '5x', range: [5, 1, 10, 1], onRange: function (item) { return item.range + 'x'; }, }, { html: 'Setting 04', icon: '', tooltip: '5x', range: [5, 1, 10, 1], onRange: function (item) { return item.range + 'x'; }, }, ], onSelect: function (item) { return item.html; }, }, ], });

title: id‚Äã
content: Type: Number A self-inclusive number of the player instance

title: option‚Äã
content: Type: Object After merged options

title: isFocus‚Äã
content: Type: Boolean Whether the player instance has been focused

title: isInput‚Äã
content: Type: Boolean Whether the player instance has been focused on input element

title: isLock‚Äã
content: Type: Boolean Whether the player instance has been locked on mobile

title: isDestroy‚Äã
content: Type: Boolean Whether the player instance is destroyed

title: whitelist‚Äã
content: Type: Object Manage the whitelist

title: template‚Äã
content: Type: Object Manage player HTML

title: query‚Äã
content: Type: Function Method query You can find DOM elements in the current player instance, equivalent to document.querySelector('.artplayer-app').querySelector ‚ñ∂ Run Code var art = new Artplayer({ container: '.artplayer-app', url: '/assets/sample/video.mp4', }); art.on('ready', () => { var $video = art.template.query('.art-video'); console.info($video); });

title: query‚Äã
content: Type: Function Equal to art.template.query ‚ñ∂ Run Code var art = new Artplayer({ container: '.artplayer-app', url: '/assets/sample/video.mp4', }); art.on('ready', () => { var $video = art.query('.art-video'); console.info($video); });

title: events‚Äã
content: Type: Object Manage the events

title: proxy‚Äã
content: Type: Function Proxy native event method, easy to manage and destroy the event ‚ñ∂ Run Code var container = document.querySelector('.artplayer-app'); var art = new Artplayer({ container: container, url: '/assets/sample/video.mp4', }); art.proxy(container, 'click', (event) => { console.info(event); });

title: storage‚Äã
content: Type: Object Manage persistent storage objects The player will automatically add a json object called artplayer_settings to the localstorage Property	Type	Descriptionget	Function	Get value set	Function	Set value del	Function	Delete value clear	Function	Clean value ‚ñ∂ Run Code var art = new Artplayer({ container: '.artplayer-app', url: '/assets/sample/video.mp4', }); art.storage.set('your-key', 'your-value'); art.storage.get('your-key'); art.storage.del('your-key'); art.storage.clear();

title: icons‚Äã
content: Type: Object Manage player icons

title: i18n‚Äã
content: Type: Object Manage player i18n

title: get‚Äã
content: Type: Getter/Setter Method get can get the value of the language value ‚ñ∂ Run Code var art = new Artplayer({ container: '.artplayer-app', url: '/assets/sample/video.mp4', }); art.on('ready', () => { console.info(art.i18n.get('Play')); });

title: update‚Äã
content: Type: Function Method update can add more languages ‚ñ∂ Run Code var art = new Artplayer({ container: '.artplayer-app', url: '/assets/sample/video.mp4', lang: 'jp', }); art.i18n.update({ 'zh-cn': { Language: 'ÁÆÄ‰Ωì', }, 'zh-tw': { Language: 'ÁπÅÈ´î', }, en: { Language: 'English', }, jp: { Language: 'Êó•Êñá', }, fr: { Language: 'Fran√ßais', }, ru: { Language: 'Russe', }, });

title: player‚Äã
content: Type: Object Manage the object of the core function

title: subtitle‚Äã
content: Type: Object Management subtitle object

title: show‚Äã
content: Type: Getter/Setter Property show can control subtitle to display ‚ñ∂ Run Code var art = new Artplayer({ container: '.artplayer-app', url: '/assets/sample/video.mp4', subtitle: { url: '/assets/sample/subtitle.srt', }, }); art.on('ready', () => { art.seek = 20; art.subtitle.show = false; setTimeout(() => { art.subtitle.show = true; }, 3000); });

title: style‚Äã
content: Type: Function Method style can dynamically modify the subtitle style ‚ñ∂ Run Code var art = new Artplayer({ container: '.artplayer-app', url: '/assets/sample/video.mp4', subtitle: { url: '/assets/sample/subtitle.srt', encoding: 'utf-8', style: { color: '#03A9F4', 'font-size': '30px', }, }, }); art.on('ready', () => { art.seek = 20; setTimeout(() => { art.subtitle.style({ color: 'red', 'font-size': '40px', }); }, 3000); });

title: url‚Äã
content: Type: Getter/Setter Propertie url can set and get the subtitle url ‚ñ∂ Run Code var art = new Artplayer({ container: '.artplayer-app', url: '/assets/sample/video.mp4', subtitle: { url: '/assets/sample/subtitle.srt', encoding: 'utf-8', style: { color: '#03A9F4', 'font-size': '30px', }, }, }); art.on('ready', () => { console.info(art.subtitle.url); setTimeout(() => { art.subtitle.url = '/assets/sample/subtitle.srt?t=1'; }, 3000); });

title: switch‚Äã
content: Type: Function Methods switch like the propertie url setter, but can modify the subtitle option ‚ñ∂ Run Code var art = new Artplayer({ container: '.artplayer-app', url: '/assets/sample/video.mp4', subtitle: { url: '/assets/sample/subtitle.srt', encoding: 'utf-8', style: { color: 'red', 'font-size': '30px', }, }, }); art.on('ready', () => { art.seek = 20; setTimeout(() => { art.subtitle.switch('/assets/sample/subtitle.srt?t=1', { name: 'The new subtitle', style: { color: 'green', 'font-size': '24px', }, }); }, 3000); });

title: info‚Äã
content: Type: Object Manage video info

title: layers‚Äã
content: Type: Object Manage the object of the layers

title: show‚Äã
content: Type: Getter/Setter Property show can control all layers to display ‚ñ∂ Run Code var img = '/assets/sample/layer.png'; var art = new Artplayer({ container: '.artplayer-app', url: '/assets/sample/video.mp4', layers: [ { html: `<img style="width: 100px" src="${img}">`, style: { position: 'absolute', top: '20px', right: '20px', opacity: '.9', }, }, { html: `<img style="width: 100px" src="${img}">`, style: { position: 'absolute', top: '20px', left: '20px', opacity: '.9', }, }, ], }); art.on('ready', () => { setTimeout(() => { art.layers.show = false; }, 3000); });

title: add‚Äã
content: Type: Function Method add can dynamically add a layer Property	Type	Descriptiondisable	Boolean	Whether to disable the component name	String	The unique name of the component, used to mark the class name index	Number	Component index, priority for display html	String„ÄÅElement	DOM element of the component style	Object	Component style object click	Function	Component click event mounted	Function	Triggered after the component is mounted tooltip	String	Prompt text of the component ‚ñ∂ Run Code var art = new Artplayer({ container: '.artplayer-app', url: '/assets/sample/video.mp4', }); var img = '/assets/sample/layer.png'; art.on('ready', () => { setTimeout(() => { art.layers.add({ html: `<img style="width: 100px" src="${img}">`, style: { position: 'absolute', top: '20px', right: '20px', opacity: '.9', }, }); }, 3000); });

title: notice‚Äã
content: Type: Object Manage the object of prompt information

title: show‚Äã
content: Type: Getter/Setter Attribute show output custom prompt information, the default residence time is two seconds, and the new information will immediately cover the old information ‚ñ∂ Run Code var art = new Artplayer({ container: '.artplayer-app', url: '/assets/sample/video.mp4', }); art.on('ready', () => { art.notice.show = 'Custom prompt information 1'; art.notice.show = 'Custom prompt information 2'; });

title: controls‚Äã
content: Type: Object Manage the object of the control bar

title: show‚Äã
content: Type: Getter/Setter Attribute show can control if the control bar is displayed ‚ñ∂ Run Code var art = new Artplayer({ container: '.artplayer-app', url: '/assets/sample/video.mp4', }); art.on('ready', () => { setTimeout(() => { art.controls.show = false; }, 3000); });

title: add‚Äã
content: Type: Function Method add can dynamically add a control Property	Type	Descriptiondisable	Boolean	Whether to disable the component name	String	The unique name of the component, used to mark the class name index	Number	Component index, priority for display html	String„ÄÅElement	DOM element of the component style	Object	Component style object click	Function	Component click event mounted	Function	Triggered after the component is mounted tooltip	String	Prompt text of the component position	String	Location at left or right ‚ñ∂ Run Code var art = new Artplayer({ container: '.artplayer-app', url: '/assets/sample/video.mp4', }); art.on('ready', () => { setTimeout(() => { art.controls.add({ disable: false, name: 'button', index: 10, position: 'right', html: 'Custom button1', tooltip: 'Custom button1', style: { color: 'red', }, click: function () { console.log('You clicked custom button 1'); }, mounted: function () { console.log('Custom button mounting is complete 1'); }, }); }, 3000); });

title: contextmenu‚Äã
content: Type: Object Manage the contextmenu

title: show‚Äã
content: Type: Getter/Setter Attribute show can control if the menu is displayed ‚ñ∂ Run Code var art = new Artplayer({ container: '.artplayer-app', url: '/assets/sample/video.mp4', }); art.on('ready', () => { art.contextmenu.show = true; setTimeout(() => { art.contextmenu.show = false; }, 3000); });

title: add‚Äã
content: Type: Function Method add can dynamically add a menu items Property	Type	Descriptiondisable	Boolean	Whether to disable the component name	String	The unique name of the component, used to mark the class name index	Number	Component index, priority for display html	String„ÄÅElement	DOM element of the component style	Object	Component style object click	Function	Component click event mounted	Function	Triggered after the component is mounted tooltip	String	Prompt text of the component ‚ñ∂ Run Code var art = new Artplayer({ container: '.artplayer-app', url: '/assets/sample/video.mp4', }); art.on('ready', () => { art.contextmenu.show = true; setTimeout(() => { art.contextmenu.add({ html: 'Custom menu', click: function () { console.info('You clicked the custom menu'); art.contextmenu.show = false; }, }); }, 3000); });

title: loading‚Äã
content: Type: Object Manage loading icon

title: show‚Äã
content: Type: Getter/Setter Property show can control whether the icon in the load is displayed ‚ñ∂ Run Code var art = new Artplayer({ container: '.artplayer-app', url: '/assets/sample/video.mp4', }); art.on('ready', () => { art.loading.show = true; setTimeout(() => { art.loading.show = false; }, 3000); });

title: mask‚Äã
content: Type: Object Manage the object of the mask layer

title: show‚Äã
content: Type: Getter/Setter Attributes show can control whether the mask layer is display ‚ñ∂ Run Code var art = new Artplayer({ container: '.artplayer-app', url: '/assets/sample/video.mp4', }); art.on('ready', () => { art.mask.show = true; setTimeout(() => { art.mask.show = false; }, 3000); });

title: hotkey‚Äã
content: Type: Object Manage hotkey

title: add‚Äã
content: Type: Function Methods add can dynamically add a hotkey, the first parameter is key code number, the second parameter is a callback function ‚ñ∂ Run Code var art = new Artplayer({ container: '.artplayer-app', url: '/assets/sample/video.mp4', }); art.on('ready', () => { art.hotkey.add(65, () => { console.info('You click A'); }); art.hotkey.add(66, () => { console.info('You click B'); }); });  Tip This hotkey will take effect only after the player gets the focus (if you click on the player).

title: setting‚Äã
content: Type: Object Manage the object of the setting panel

title: show‚Äã
content: Type: Getter/Setter Property show can control the setting panel to display ‚ñ∂ Run Code var art = new Artplayer({ container: '.artplayer-app', url: '/assets/sample/video.mp4', setting: true, autoSize: true, }); art.on('ready', () => { art.seek = 20; art.setting.show = true; setTimeout(() => { art.setting.show = false; }, 3000); });

title: plugins‚Äã
content: Type: Object Manage plugin

title: add‚Äã
content: Type: Function Method add can be dynamically add a plugin ‚ñ∂ Run Code function myPlugin(art) { console.info('You can access an instance of a player in the plugin'); return { name: 'myPlugin', something: 'Custom export properties', doSomething: function () { console.info('Custom export method'); }, }; } var art = new Artplayer({ container: '.artplayer-app', url: '/assets/sample/video.mp4', }); art.on('ready', () => { art.plugins.add(myPlugin); console.info(art.plugins.myPlugin.something); console.info(art.plugins.myPlugin.doSomething()); });

title: Native event‚Äã
content: For more information, please read Mozilla Video Events Event name	Fired Whenvideo:canplay	The browser can play the media, but estimates that not enough data has been loaded to play the media up to its end without having to stop for further buffering of content. video:canplaythrough	The browser estimates it can play the media up to its end without stopping for content buffering. video:complete	The rendering of an OfflineAudioContext is terminated. video:durationchange	The duration attribute has been updated. video:emptied	The media has become empty; for example, this event is sent if the media has already been loaded (or partially loaded), and the load() method is called to reload it. video:ended	Playback has stopped because the end of the media was reached. video:loadeddata	The first frame of the media has finished loading. video:loadedmetadata	The metadata has been loaded. video:pause	Playback has been paused. video:play	Playback has begun. video:playing	Playback is ready to start after having been paused or delayed due to lack of data. video:progress	Fired periodically as the browser loads a resource. video:ratechange	The playback rate has changed. video:seeked	A seek operation completed. video:seeking	A seek operation began. video:stalled	The user agent is trying to fetch media data, but data is unexpectedly not forthcoming. video:suspend	Media data loading has been suspended. video:timeupdate	The time indicated by the currentTime attribute has been updated. video:volumechange	The volume has changed. video:waiting	Playback has stopped because of a temporary lack of data ‚ñ∂ Run Code var art = new Artplayer({ container: '.artplayer-app', url: '/assets/sample/video.mp4', }); art.on('video:play', (...args) => { console.info(args); });

title: ready‚Äã
content: Fired when the player is initialized, and the video can be played ‚ñ∂ Run Code var art = new Artplayer({ container: '.artplayer-app', url: '/assets/sample/video.mp4', }); art.on('ready', (...args) => { console.info(args); });

title: play‚Äã
content: Fired after the video is played ‚ñ∂ Run Code var art = new Artplayer({ container: '.artplayer-app', url: '/assets/sample/video.mp4', }); art.on('play', (...args) => { console.info(args); });

title: pause‚Äã
content: Fired after the video is pause ‚ñ∂ Run Code var art = new Artplayer({ container: '.artplayer-app', url: '/assets/sample/video.mp4', }); art.on('pause', (...args) => { console.info(args); });

title: seek‚Äã
content: Fired when the video is time jump ‚ñ∂ Run Code var art = new Artplayer({ container: '.artplayer-app', url: '/assets/sample/video.mp4', }); art.on('seek', (...args) => { console.info(args); }); art.on('ready', (...args) => { art.seek = 5; });  Tip Set the art.currentTime will not fired the seek event

title: volume‚Äã
content: Fired when the video volume changes ‚ñ∂ Run Code var art = new Artplayer({ container: '.artplayer-app', url: '/assets/sample/video.mp4', }); art.on('volume', (...args) => { console.info(args); }); art.on('ready', (...args) => { art.volume = 0.5; });

title: destroy‚Äã
content: Fired when the player instance is destroyed ‚ñ∂ Run Code var art = new Artplayer({ container: '.artplayer-app', url: '/assets/sample/video.mp4', }); art.on('destroy', (...args) => { console.info(args); }); art.on('ready', (...args) => { art.destroy(); });

title: focus‚Äã
content: Fired when the player gets focus, if you click on the player ‚ñ∂ Run Code var art = new Artplayer({ container: '.artplayer-app', url: '/assets/sample/video.mp4', }); art.on('focus', (...args) => { console.info(args); });

title: blur‚Äã
content: Fired when the player loses focus, such as the area other than the player ‚ñ∂ Run Code var art = new Artplayer({ container: '.artplayer-app', url: '/assets/sample/video.mp4', }); art.on('blur', (...args) => { console.info(args); });

title: hover‚Äã
content: Fired when mouse moves player ‚ñ∂ Run Code var art = new Artplayer({ container: '.artplayer-app', url: '/assets/sample/video.mp4', }); art.on('hover', (state) => { // state for true, the mouse moves from the outside to the player // state for false, the mouse moves from the player to the outside console.info(state); });

title: resize‚Äã
content: Fired when the player is changed ‚ñ∂ Run Code var art = new Artplayer({ container: '.artplayer-app', url: '/assets/sample/video.mp4', autoSize: true, }); art.on('resize', (...args) => { console.info(args); });

title: mousemove‚Äã
content: Fired when the mouse is played, this and hover is different, it will trigger multiple times ‚ñ∂ Run Code var art = new Artplayer({ container: '.artplayer-app', url: '/assets/sample/video.mp4', }); art.on('mousemove', (...args) => { console.info(args); });

title: url‚Äã
content: Fired when the video url changes ‚ñ∂ Run Code var art = new Artplayer({ container: '.artplayer-app', url: '/assets/sample/video.mp4', }); art.on('url', (...args) => { console.info(args); }); art.on('ready', (...args) => { art.url = '/assets/sample/video.mp4?t=0'; });

title: fullscreen‚Äã
content: Fired when the player window is full screen ‚ñ∂ Run Code var art = new Artplayer({ container: '.artplayer-app', url: '/assets/sample/video.mp4', fullscreen: true, }); art.on('fullscreen', (...args) => { console.info(args); });

title: fullscreenWeb‚Äã
content: Fired when player webpage full screen ‚ñ∂ Run Code var art = new Artplayer({ container: '.artplayer-app', url: '/assets/sample/video.mp4', fullscreenWeb: true, }); art.on('fullscreenWeb', (...args) => { console.info(args); });

title: hotkey‚Äã
content: Trigger when hotkey are used ‚ñ∂ Run Code var art = new Artplayer({ container: '.artplayer-app', url: '/assets/sample/video.mp4', }); art.on('hotkey', (...args) => { console.info(args); });

title: Âú® Html ‰ΩøÁî®‚Äã
content: index.html <!DOCTYPE html><html> <head> <title>ArtPlayer Demo</title> <meta charset="UTF-8" /> <style> .artplayer-app { width: 400px; height: 300px; } </style> </head> <body> <div class="artplayer-app"></div> <script src="path/to/artplayer.js"></script> <script> var art = new Artplayer({ container: '.artplayer-app', url: '/assets/sample/video.mp4', }); </script> </body></html>

title: Âú® Vue.js„ÄÅNuxt.js ‰ΩøÁî®‚Äã
content: Vue.js Ê®°ÊùøNuxt.js Ê®°Êùø üöÄ artplayer-template/vue.js Artplayer.vueApp.vue Artplayer.vue <template> <div ref="artRef"></div></template><script>import Artplayer from "artplayer";export default { data() { return { instance: null, }; }, props: { option: { type: Object, required: true, }, }, mounted() { this.instance = new Artplayer({ ...this.option, container: this.$refs.artRef, }); this.$nextTick(() => { this.$emit("get-instance", this.instance); }); }, beforeUnmount() { if (this.instance && this.instance.destroy) { this.instance.destroy(false); } },};</script>

title: Âú® React.js„ÄÅNext.js ‰ΩøÁî®‚Äã
content: React.js Ê®°ÊùøNext.js Ê®°Êùø üöÄ artplayer-template/react.js ArtPlayer.jsxApp.jsx ArtPlayer.jsx import { useEffect, useRef } from 'react';import Artplayer from 'artplayer';export default function Player({ option, getInstance, ...rest }) { const artRef = useRef(); useEffect(() => { const art = new Artplayer({ ...option, container: artRef.current, }); if (getInstance && typeof getInstance === 'function') { getInstance(art); } return () => { if (art && art.destroy) { art.destroy(false); } }; }, []); return <div ref={artRef} {...rest}></div>;}

content: Á±ªÂûã: Getter/Setter ÊñπÊ≥ï get ÂèØ‰ª•Ëé∑ÂèñÂà∞ÂØπÂ∫îÁöÑËØ≠Ë®ÄÁöÑÂÄº ‚ñ∂ Run Code var art = new Artplayer({ container: '.artplayer-app', url: '/assets/sample/video.mp4', }); art.on('ready', () => { console.info(art.i18n.get('Play')); });

title: show‚Äã
content: Á±ªÂûã: Getter/Setter Â±ûÊÄß show ÂèØ‰ª•ÊéßÂà∂Â≠óÂπïÊòæÁ§∫ ‚ñ∂ Run Code var art = new Artplayer({ container: '.artplayer-app', url: '/assets/sample/video.mp4', subtitle: { url: '/assets/sample/subtitle.srt', }, }); art.on('ready', () => { art.seek = 20; art.subtitle.show = false; setTimeout(() => { art.subtitle.show = true; }, 3000); });

title: style‚Äã
content: Á±ªÂûã: Function ÊñπÊ≥ï style ÂèØ‰ª•Âä®ÊÄÅ‰øÆÊîπÂ≠óÂπïÊ†∑Âºè ‚ñ∂ Run Code var art = new Artplayer({ container: '.artplayer-app', url: '/assets/sample/video.mp4', subtitle: { url: '/assets/sample/subtitle.srt', encoding: 'utf-8', style: { color: '#03A9F4', 'font-size': '30px', }, }, }); art.on('ready', () => { art.seek = 20; setTimeout(() => { art.subtitle.style({ color: 'red', 'font-size': '40px', }); }, 3000); });

title: url‚Äã
content: Á±ªÂûã: Getter/Setter Â±ûÊÄß url ÂèØ‰ª•ËÆæÁΩÆÂíåËé∑ÂèñÂ≠óÂπïÁΩëÂùÄ ‚ñ∂ Run Code var art = new Artplayer({ container: '.artplayer-app', url: '/assets/sample/video.mp4', subtitle: { url: '/assets/sample/subtitle.srt', encoding: 'utf-8', style: { color: '#03A9F4', 'font-size': '30px', }, }, }); art.on('ready', () => { console.info(art.subtitle.url); setTimeout(() => { art.subtitle.url = '/assets/sample/subtitle.srt?t=1'; }, 3000); });

title: switch‚Äã
content: Á±ªÂûã: Function ÊñπÊ≥ï switch Â∞±ÂÉèÂ±ûÊÄßËÆæÁΩÆ urlÔºå‰ΩÜÂèØ‰ª•‰øÆÊîπÂ≠óÂπïÈÄâÈ°π ‚ñ∂ Run Code var art = new Artplayer({ container: '.artplayer-app', url: '/assets/sample/video.mp4', subtitle: { url: '/assets/sample/subtitle.srt', encoding: 'utf-8', style: { color: 'red', 'font-size': '30px', }, }, }); art.on('ready', () => { art.seek = 20; setTimeout(() => { art.subtitle.switch('/assets/sample/subtitle.srt?t=1', { name: 'The new subtitle', style: { color: 'green', 'font-size': '24px', }, }); }, 3000); });

content: Á±ªÂûã: Getter/Setter Â±ûÊÄß show ÂèØ‰ª•ÊéßÂà∂ÂÖ®ÈÉ®ÂõæÂ±ÇÊòØÂê¶ÊòæÁ§∫ ‚ñ∂ Run Code var img = '/assets/sample/layer.png'; var art = new Artplayer({ container: '.artplayer-app', url: '/assets/sample/video.mp4', layers: [ { html: `<img style="width: 100px" src="${img}">`, style: { position: 'absolute', top: '20px', right: '20px', opacity: '.9', }, }, { html: `<img style="width: 100px" src="${img}">`, style: { position: 'absolute', top: '20px', left: '20px', opacity: '.9', }, }, ], }); art.on('ready', () => { setTimeout(() => { art.layers.show = false; }, 3000); });

content: Á±ªÂûã: Function ÊñπÊ≥ï add ÂèØ‰ª•Âä®ÊÄÅÊ∑ªÂä†‰∏öÂä°Â±Ç Â±ûÊÄß	Á±ªÂûã	ÊèèËø∞disable	Boolean	ÊòØÂê¶Á¶ÅÁî®ÁªÑ‰ª∂ name	String	ÁªÑ‰ª∂ÂîØ‰∏ÄÂêçÁß∞ÔºåÁî®‰∫éÊ†áËÆ∞Á±ªÂêç index	Number	ÁªÑ‰ª∂Á¥¢ÂºïÔºåÁî®‰∫éÊòæÁ§∫ÁöÑ‰ºòÂÖàÁ∫ß html	String„ÄÅElement	ÁªÑ‰ª∂ÁöÑ DOM ÂÖÉÁ¥† style	Object	ÁªÑ‰ª∂Ê†∑ÂºèÂØπË±° click	Function	ÁªÑ‰ª∂ÁÇπÂáª‰∫ã‰ª∂ mounted	Function	ÁªÑ‰ª∂ÊåÇËΩΩÂêéËß¶Âèë tooltip	String	ÁªÑ‰ª∂ÁöÑÊèêÁ§∫ÊñáÊú¨ ‚ñ∂ Run Code var art = new Artplayer({ container: '.artplayer-app', url: '/assets/sample/video.mp4', }); var img = '/assets/sample/layer.png'; art.on('ready', () => { setTimeout(() => { art.layers.add({ html: `<img style="width: 100px" src="${img}">`, style: { position: 'absolute', top: '20px', right: '20px', opacity: '.9', }, }); }, 3000); });

title: show‚Äã
content: Á±ªÂûã: Getter/Setter Â±ûÊÄß show ËæìÂá∫Ëá™ÂÆö‰πâÊèêÁ§∫‰ø°ÊÅØÔºåÈªòËÆ§ÂÅúÁïôÊó∂Èó¥‰∏∫‰∏§ÁßíÔºå‰∏îÊñ∞ÁöÑ‰ø°ÊÅØ‰ºöÈ©¨‰∏äË¶ÜÁõñÊóßÁöÑ‰ø°ÊÅØ ‚ñ∂ Run Code var art = new Artplayer({ container: '.artplayer-app', url: '/assets/sample/video.mp4', }); art.on('ready', () => { art.notice.show = 'Ëá™ÂÆö‰πâÊèêÁ§∫‰ø°ÊÅØ1'; art.notice.show = 'Ëá™ÂÆö‰πâÊèêÁ§∫‰ø°ÊÅØ2'; });

title: show‚Äã
content: Á±ªÂûã: Getter/Setter Â±ûÊÄß show ÂèØ‰ª•ÊéßÂà∂ÊéßÂà∂Ê†èÊòØÂê¶ÊòæÁ§∫ ‚ñ∂ Run Code var art = new Artplayer({ container: '.artplayer-app', url: '/assets/sample/video.mp4', }); art.on('ready', () => { setTimeout(() => { art.controls.show = false; }, 3000); });

title: add‚Äã
content: Á±ªÂûã: Function ÊñπÊ≥ï add ÂèØ‰ª•Âä®ÊÄÅÊ∑ªÂä†ÊéßÂà∂Âô® Â±ûÊÄß	Á±ªÂûã	ÊèèËø∞disable	Boolean	ÊòØÂê¶Á¶ÅÁî®ÁªÑ‰ª∂ name	String	ÁªÑ‰ª∂ÂîØ‰∏ÄÂêçÁß∞ÔºåÁî®‰∫éÊ†áËÆ∞Á±ªÂêç index	Number	ÁªÑ‰ª∂Á¥¢ÂºïÔºåÁî®‰∫éÊòæÁ§∫ÁöÑ‰ºòÂÖàÁ∫ß html	String„ÄÅElement	ÁªÑ‰ª∂ÁöÑ DOM ÂÖÉÁ¥† style	Object	ÁªÑ‰ª∂Ê†∑ÂºèÂØπË±° click	Function	ÁªÑ‰ª∂ÁÇπÂáª‰∫ã‰ª∂ mounted	Function	ÁªÑ‰ª∂ÊåÇËΩΩÂêéËß¶Âèë tooltip	String	ÁªÑ‰ª∂ÁöÑÊèêÁ§∫ÊñáÊú¨ position	String	‰ΩçÁΩÆÂú® left ÊàñËÄÖ right ‚ñ∂ Run Code var art = new Artplayer({ container: '.artplayer-app', url: '/assets/sample/video.mp4', }); art.on('ready', () => { setTimeout(() => { art.controls.add({ position: 'right', index: 10, html: 'Ëá™ÂÆö‰πâÊåâÈíÆ', tooltip: 'Ëá™ÂÆö‰πâÊåâÈíÆÁöÑÊèêÁ§∫', click: function () { console.log('‰Ω†ÁÇπÂáª‰∫ÜËá™ÂÆö‰πâÊåâÈíÆ'); }, }); }, 3000); });

title: contextmenu‚Äã
content: Á±ªÂûã: Object ÁÆ°ÁêÜÂè≥ÈîÆËèúÂçïÁöÑÂØπË±°

title: show‚Äã
content: Á±ªÂûã: Getter/Setter Â±ûÊÄß show ÂèØ‰ª•ÊéßÂà∂ËèúÂçïÊòØÂê¶ÊòæÁ§∫ ‚ñ∂ Run Code var art = new Artplayer({ container: '.artplayer-app', url: '/assets/sample/video.mp4', }); art.on('ready', () => { art.contextmenu.show = true; setTimeout(() => { art.contextmenu.show = false; }, 3000); });

title: add‚Äã
content: Á±ªÂûã: Function ÊñπÊ≥ï add ÂèØ‰ª•Âä®ÊÄÅÊ∑ªÂä†ËèúÂçïÈ°π Â±ûÊÄß	Á±ªÂûã	ÊèèËø∞disable	Boolean	ÊòØÂê¶Á¶ÅÁî®ÁªÑ‰ª∂ name	String	ÁªÑ‰ª∂ÂîØ‰∏ÄÂêçÁß∞ÔºåÁî®‰∫éÊ†áËÆ∞Á±ªÂêç index	Number	ÁªÑ‰ª∂Á¥¢ÂºïÔºåÁî®‰∫éÊòæÁ§∫ÁöÑ‰ºòÂÖàÁ∫ß html	String„ÄÅElement	ÁªÑ‰ª∂ÁöÑ DOM ÂÖÉÁ¥† style	Object	ÁªÑ‰ª∂Ê†∑ÂºèÂØπË±° click	Function	ÁªÑ‰ª∂ÁÇπÂáª‰∫ã‰ª∂ mounted	Function	ÁªÑ‰ª∂ÊåÇËΩΩÂêéËß¶Âèë tooltip	String	ÁªÑ‰ª∂ÁöÑÊèêÁ§∫ÊñáÊú¨ ‚ñ∂ Run Code var art = new Artplayer({ container: '.artplayer-app', url: '/assets/sample/video.mp4', }); art.on('ready', () => { art.contextmenu.show = true; setTimeout(() => { art.contextmenu.add({ html: 'Ëá™ÂÆö‰πâËèúÂçï', click: function () { console.info('‰Ω†ÁÇπÂáª‰∫ÜËá™ÂÆö‰πâËèúÂçï'); art.contextmenu.show = false; }, }); }, 3000); });

title: loading‚Äã
content: Á±ªÂûã: Object ÁÆ°ÁêÜÂä†ËΩΩ‰∏≠ÁöÑÂõæÊ†á

title: show‚Äã
content: Á±ªÂûã: Getter/Setter Â±ûÊÄß show ÂèØ‰ª•ÊéßÂà∂ÊòØÂê¶ÊòæÁ§∫Âä†ËΩΩ‰∏≠ÁöÑÂõæÊ†á ‚ñ∂ Run Code var art = new Artplayer({ container: '.artplayer-app', url: '/assets/sample/video.mp4', }); art.on('ready', () => { art.loading.show = true; setTimeout(() => { art.loading.show = false; }, 3000); });

title: mask‚Äã
content: Á±ªÂûã: Object ÁÆ°ÁêÜÈÅÆÁΩ©Â±ÇÁöÑÂØπË±°

title: show‚Äã
content: Á±ªÂûã: Getter/Setter Â±ûÊÄß show ÂèØ‰ª•ÊéßÂà∂ÈÅÆÁΩ©Â±ÇÊòØÂê¶Âä†ËΩΩÂ±Ç ‚ñ∂ Run Code var art = new Artplayer({ container: '.artplayer-app', url: '/assets/sample/video.mp4', }); art.on('ready', () => { art.mask.show = true; setTimeout(() => { art.mask.show = false; }, 3000); });

title: hotkey‚Äã
content: Á±ªÂûã: Object ÁÆ°ÁêÜÂø´Êç∑ÈîÆÁöÑÂØπË±°

title: add‚Äã
content: Á±ªÂûã: Function ÊñπÊ≥ï add ÂèØ‰ª•Âä®ÊÄÅÊ∑ªÂä†Âø´Êç∑ÈîÆÔºåÁ¨¨‰∏Ä‰∏™ÂèÇÊï∞ÊòØ key code Êï∞Â≠óÔºåÁ¨¨‰∫å‰∏™ÂèÇÊï∞ÊòØÂõûË∞ÉÂáΩÊï∞ ‚ñ∂ Run Code var art = new Artplayer({ container: '.artplayer-app', url: '/assets/sample/video.mp4', }); art.on('ready', () => { art.hotkey.add(65, () => { console.info('‰Ω†ÁÇπÂáª‰∫Ü A ÈîÆ'); }); art.hotkey.add(66, () => { console.info('‰Ω†ÁÇπÂáª‰∫Ü B ÈîÆ'); }); });  ÊèêÁ§∫ Âè™Âú®Êí≠ÊîæÂô®Ëé∑ÂæóÁÑ¶ÁÇπÂêéÔºàÂ¶ÇÁÇπÂáª‰∫ÜÊí≠ÊîæÂô®ÂêéÔºâÔºåËØ•Âø´Êç∑ÈîÆÊâç‰ºöÁîüÊïà

title: setting‚Äã
content: Á±ªÂûã: Object ÁÆ°ÁêÜËÆæÁΩÆÈù¢ÊùøÁöÑÂØπË±°

title: show‚Äã
content: Á±ªÂûã: Getter/Setter Â±ûÊÄß show ÂèØ‰ª•ÊéßÂà∂ËÆæÁΩÆÈù¢ÊùøÊòØÂê¶ÊòæÁ§∫ ‚ñ∂ Run Code var art = new Artplayer({ container: '.artplayer-app', url: '/assets/sample/video.mp4', setting: true, autoSize: true, }); art.on('ready', () => { art.seek = 20; art.setting.show = true; setTimeout(() => { art.setting.show = false; }, 3000); });

title: plugins‚Äã
content: Á±ªÂûã: Object ÁÆ°ÁêÜÊèí‰ª∂ÁöÑÂØπË±°

title: add‚Äã
content: Á±ªÂûã: Function ÊñπÊ≥ï add ÂèØ‰ª•Âä®ÊÄÅÊ∑ªÂä†Êèí‰ª∂ ‚ñ∂ Run Code function myPlugin(art) { console.info('‰Ω†ÂèØ‰ª•Âú®Êèí‰ª∂ÈáåËÆøÈóÆÂà∞Êí≠ÊîæÂô®ÁöÑÂÆû‰æã'); return { name: 'myPlugin', something: 'Ëá™ÂÆö‰πâÂØºÂá∫ÁöÑÂ±ûÊÄß', doSomething: function () { console.info('Ëá™ÂÆö‰πâÂØºÂá∫ÁöÑÊñπÊ≥ï'); }, }; } var art = new Artplayer({ container: '.artplayer-app', url: '/assets/sample/video.mp4', }); art.on('ready', () => { art.plugins.add(myPlugin); console.info(art.plugins.myPlugin.something); console.info(art.plugins.myPlugin.doSomething()); });

title: play‚Äã
content: Type: Function Play video ‚ñ∂ Run Code var art = new Artplayer({ container: '.artplayer-app', url: '/assets/sample/video.mp4', muted: true, }); art.on('ready', () => { art.play(); });

title: pause‚Äã
content: Type: Function Pause video ‚ñ∂ Run Code var art = new Artplayer({ container: '.artplayer-app', url: '/assets/sample/video.mp4', muted: true, }); art.on('ready', () => { art.play(); setTimeout(() => { art.pause(); }, 3000); });

title: toggle‚Äã
content: Type: Function Switch Video playback and pause ‚ñ∂ Run Code var art = new Artplayer({ container: '.artplayer-app', url: '/assets/sample/video.mp4', muted: true, }); art.on('ready', () => { art.toggle(); setTimeout(() => { art.toggle(); }, 3000); });

title: seek‚Äã
content: Type: SetterParameter: Number Video time jump, unit seconds ‚ñ∂ Run Code var art = new Artplayer({ container: '.artplayer-app', url: '/assets/sample/video.mp4', }); art.on('ready', () => { art.seek = 5; });

title: forward‚Äã
content: Type: SetterParameter: Number Video time forward, unit seconds ‚ñ∂ Run Code var art = new Artplayer({ container: '.artplayer-app', url: '/assets/sample/video.mp4', }); art.on('ready', () => { art.forward = 5; });

title: backward‚Äã
content: Type: SetterParameter: Number Video time backward, unit seconds ‚ñ∂ Run Code var art = new Artplayer({ container: '.artplayer-app', url: '/assets/sample/video.mp4', }); art.on('ready', () => { art.seek = 5; setTimeout(() => { art.backward = 2; }, 3000); });

title: volume‚Äã
content: Type: Setter/GetterParameter: Number Set and get video volume, range: [0, 1] ‚ñ∂ Run Code var art = new Artplayer({ container: '.artplayer-app', url: '/assets/sample/video.mp4', }); art.on('ready', () => { console.info(art.volume); art.volume = 0.5; console.info(art.volume); });

title: url‚Äã
content: Type: Setter/GetterParameter: String Set and get video url ‚ñ∂ Run Code var art = new Artplayer({ container: '.artplayer-app', url: '/assets/sample/video.mp4', }); art.on('ready', () => { console.info(art.url); art.url = '/assets/sample/video.mp4?t=0'; console.info(art.url); });

title: switchUrl‚Äã
content: Type: FunctionParameter: String Set video url, set, like the url, but will perform some optimization operations The function supports two parameters, the first one for the new video url, the second is new video name ‚ñ∂ Run Code var art = new Artplayer({ container: '.artplayer-app', url: '/assets/sample/video.mp4', }); art.on('ready', () => { art.seek = 10; setTimeout(() => { art.switchUrl('/assets/sample/video.mp4?t=0', 'New video name'); }, 3000); });

title: switchQuality‚Äã
content: Type: FunctionParameter: String Set the video quality address, like the switchUrl, but will bring the previous play progress The function supports two parameters, the first one for the new video url, the second is new video name ‚ñ∂ Run Code var art = new Artplayer({ container: '.artplayer-app', url: '/assets/sample/video.mp4', }); art.on('ready', () => { art.seek = 10; setTimeout(() => { art.switchQuality('/assets/sample/video.mp4?t=0', 'New video name'); }, 3000); });

title: muted‚Äã
content: Type: Setter/GetterParameter: Boolean Setting up and getting the video mute ‚ñ∂ Run Code var art = new Artplayer({ container: '.artplayer-app', url: '/assets/sample/video.mp4', }); art.on('ready', () => { console.info(art.muted); art.muted = true; console.info(art.muted); });

title: currentTime‚Äã
content: Type: Setter/GetterParameter: Number Set and get the video current time, set time like the seek, but it does not trigger additional events ‚ñ∂ Run Code var art = new Artplayer({ container: '.artplayer-app', url: '/assets/sample/video.mp4', }); art.on('ready', () => { console.info(art.currentTime); art.currentTime = 5; console.info(art.currentTime); });

title: duration‚Äã
content: Type: Getter Get video duration ‚ñ∂ Run Code var art = new Artplayer({ container: '.artplayer-app', url: '/assets/sample/video.mp4', }); art.on('ready', () => { console.info(art.duration); });  Tip Some videos are there is no duration, such as the live video or video is not decoded, the duration will be 0

title: screenshot‚Äã
content: Type: Function Download the current video frame screenshot ‚ñ∂ Run Code var art = new Artplayer({ container: '.artplayer-app', url: '/assets/sample/video.mp4', }); art.on('ready', () => { art.seek = 10; art.once('video:canplay', () => { art.screenshot(); }); });

title: getDataURL‚Äã
content: Type: Function Get the base64 url of the current video frame, return to a Promise ‚ñ∂ Run Code var art = new Artplayer({ container: '.artplayer-app', url: '/assets/sample/video.mp4', }); art.on('ready', () => { art.seek = 10; art.getDataURL().then((url) => console.info(url)); });

title: getBlobUrl‚Äã
content: Type: Function Get the blob url of the current video frame, return to a Promise ‚ñ∂ Run Code var art = new Artplayer({ container: '.artplayer-app', url: '/assets/sample/video.mp4', }); art.on('ready', () => { art.seek = 10; art.getBlobUrl().then((url) => console.info(url)); });

title: fullscreen‚Äã
content: Type: Setter/GetterParameter: Boolean Set and get a player window full screen ‚ñ∂ Run Code var art = new Artplayer({ container: '.artplayer-app', url: '/assets/sample/video.mp4', fullscreen: true, }); art.on('ready', () => { art.fullscreen = true; setTimeout(() => { art.fullscreen = false; }, 3000); });  Tip Due to the browser security mechanism, the page must be exchanged before the window full screen, such as the user click on the page)

title: fullscreenWeb‚Äã
content: Type: Setter/GetterParameter: Boolean Setting up and get a player web page full screen ‚ñ∂ Run Code var art = new Artplayer({ container: '.artplayer-app', url: '/assets/sample/video.mp4', fullscreenWeb: true, }); art.on('ready', () => { art.fullscreenWeb = true; setTimeout(() => { art.fullscreenWeb = false; }, 3000); });

title: pip‚Äã
content: Type: Setter/GetterParameter: Boolean Set and get player PIP Mode ‚ñ∂ Run Code var art = new Artplayer({ container: '.artplayer-app', url: '/assets/sample/video.mp4', fullscreenWeb: true, }); art.on('ready', () => { art.pip = true; setTimeout(() => { art.pip = false; }, 3000); });  Tip Due to the browser security mechanism, the page must be exchanged first before the PIP (such as user clicking over the page)

title: poster‚Äã
content: Type: Setter/GetterParameter: String Setting up and get a video poster, only the poster effect can only be seen before the video is played ‚ñ∂ Run Code var art = new Artplayer({ container: '.artplayer-app', url: '/assets/sample/video.mp4', poster: '/assets/sample/poster.jpg', }); art.on('ready', () => { console.info(art.poster); art.poster = '/assets/sample/poster.jpg?t=0'; console.info(art.poster); });

title: mini‚Äã
content: Type: Setter/GetterParameter: Boolean Set and get player mini mode ‚ñ∂ Run Code var art = new Artplayer({ container: '.artplayer-app', url: '/assets/sample/video.mp4', }); art.on('ready', () => { art.mini = true; });

title: playing‚Äã
content: Type: GetterParameter: Boolean Get the video is playing ‚ñ∂ Run Code var art = new Artplayer({ container: '.artplayer-app', url: '/assets/sample/video.mp4', muted: true, }); art.on('ready', () => { console.info(art.playing); art.play(); console.info(art.playing); });

title: autoSize‚Äã
content: Type: Setter/GetterParameter: Boolean Set whether the video is adaptive, set to true, it will only execute once ‚ñ∂ Run Code var art = new Artplayer({ container: '.artplayer-app', url: '/assets/sample/video.mp4', }); art.on('ready', () => { console.info(art.autoSize); art.autoSize = true; console.info(art.autoSize); });

title: rect‚Äã
content: Type: Getter Get the size and coordinate information of the player ‚ñ∂ Run Code var art = new Artplayer({ container: '.artplayer-app', url: '/assets/sample/video.mp4', }); art.on('ready', () => { console.info(JSON.stringify(art.rect)); });  Tip Size and coordinate information is obtained by getBoundingClientRect

title: flip‚Äã
content: Type: Setter/GetterParameter: String Set and get player flip, support normal, horizontal, vertical ‚ñ∂ Run Code var art = new Artplayer({ container: '.artplayer-app', url: '/assets/sample/video.mp4', }); art.on('ready', () => { console.info(art.flip); art.flip = 'horizontal'; console.info(art.flip); });

title: playbackRate‚Äã
content: Type: Setter/GetterParameter: Number Set and get player playback speed, support 0.5, 0.75, 1.0, 1.25, 1.5, 1.75, 2.0 ‚ñ∂ Run Code var art = new Artplayer({ container: '.artplayer-app', url: '/assets/sample/video.mp4', }); art.on('ready', () => { console.info(art.playbackRate); art.playbackRate = 2; console.info(art.playbackRate); });

title: aspectRatio‚Äã
content: Type: Setter/GetterParameter: String Set and get the player long aspect, support default, 4:3, 16:9 ‚ñ∂ Run Code var art = new Artplayer({ container: '.artplayer-app', url: '/assets/sample/video.mp4', }); art.on('ready', () => { console.info(art.aspectRatio); art.aspectRatio = '16:9'; console.info(art.aspectRatio); });

title: loop‚Äã
content: Type: Setter/GetterParameter: Array Setting and getting the interval to play in seconds, unit seconds ‚ñ∂ Run Code var art = new Artplayer({ container: '.artplayer-app', url: '/assets/sample/video.mp4', }); art.on('ready', () => { console.info(art.loop); art.loop = [5, 10]; console.info(art.loop); });  Tip Delete interval loop play, only need to set up loop is []

title: autoHeight‚Äã
content: Type: Setter/GetterDefault: Boolean When the container has only width, you want the container height adapt to the player aspect ratio. ‚ñ∂ Run Code var art = new Artplayer({ container: '.artplayer-app', url: '/assets/sample/video.mp4', }); art.on('ready', () => { console.info(art.autoHeight); art.autoHeight = true; console.info(art.autoHeight); });

title: attr‚Äã
content: Type: FunctionParameter: String Dynamically get and set the properties of the video element ‚ñ∂ Run Code var art = new Artplayer({ container: '.artplayer-app', url: '/assets/sample/video.mp4', }); art.on('ready', () => { console.info(art.attr('playsInline')); art.attr('playsInline', true); console.info(art.attr('playsInline')); });

title: title‚Äã
content: Type: Setter/GetterParameter: String Dynamic get and set player title ‚ñ∂ Run Code var art = new Artplayer({ container: '.artplayer-app', url: '/assets/sample/video.mp4', }); art.on('ready', () => { console.info(art.title); art.title = 'New Title'; console.info(art.title); });

title: theme‚Äã
content: Type: Setter/GetterParameter: String Dynamic get and set player theme color ‚ñ∂ Run Code var art = new Artplayer({ container: '.artplayer-app', url: '/assets/sample/video.mp4', }); art.on('ready', () => { console.info(art.theme); art.theme = '#000'; console.info(art.theme); });

title: airplay‚Äã
content: Type: Function Open the Airplay ‚ñ∂ Run Code var art = new Artplayer({ container: '.artplayer-app', url: '/assets/sample/video.mp4', controls: [ { name: 'airplay', position: 'right', html: 'AirPlay', click: function () { art.airplay(); }, }, ], });

title: destroy‚Äã
content: Type: FunctionParameter: Boolean Destroy the player ‚ñ∂ Run Code var art = new Artplayer({ container: '.artplayer-app', url: '/assets/sample/video.mp4', }); art.on('ready', () => { art.destroy(); });

title: container‚Äã
content: Type: String„ÄÅElementDefault: #artplayerRequired: Yes The dom container mounted by the player must have a size, otherwise the player cannot display ‚ñ∂ Run Code var art = new Artplayer({ container: '.artplayer-app', // container: document.querySelector('.artplayer-app'), url: '/assets/sample/video.mp4', });  You may need to initialize the size of the container element, such as: .artplayer-app { width: 400px; height: 300px; }

title: url‚Äã
content: Type: StringDefault: ''Required: Yes Video source address, default support three video file formats: .mp4„ÄÅ.ogg„ÄÅ.webm ‚ñ∂ Run Code var art = new Artplayer({ container: '.artplayer-app', url: '/assets/sample/video.mp4', });

title: Ready Callback‚Äã
content: Type: FunctionDefault: undefined The constructor accepts a function as the second parameter, fired when the player is initialized and the video can be play, just like ready event ‚ñ∂ Run Code var art = new Artplayer( { container: '.artplayer-app', url: '/assets/sample/video.mp4', muted: true, }, function () { this.play(); }, );  ÊèêÁ§∫ The this in the callback function is the player instance, but the callback function is used to use the arrow function, this is not to point to the player instance

title: poster‚Äã
content: Type: StringDefault: '' The poster of the video will only appear in a state in which the player is initialized and not played. ‚ñ∂ Run Code var art = new Artplayer({ container: '.artplayer-app', url: '/assets/sample/video.mp4', poster: '/assets/sample/poster.jpg', });

title: title‚Äã
content: Type: StringDefault: '' Video headings, currently appear in video screenshots and mini mode ‚ñ∂ Run Code var art = new Artplayer({ container: '.artplayer-app', url: '/assets/sample/video.mp4', title: '„ÄêÊñ∞Êµ∑ËØöÂä®Áîª„Äë„ÄéÁßíÈÄü5„Çª„É≥„ÉÅ„É°„Éº„Éà„É´„Äè', screenshot: true, });

title: theme‚Äã
content: Type: StringDefault: #f00 Player theme color, currently only on the progress bar ‚ñ∂ Run Code var art = new Artplayer({ container: '.artplayer-app', url: '/assets/sample/video.mp4', theme: '#ffad00', });

title: volume‚Äã
content: Type: NumberDefault: 0.7 Default volume of the player ‚ñ∂ Run Code var art = new Artplayer({ container: '.artplayer-app', url: '/assets/sample/video.mp4', volume: 0.5, });  Tip The player caches the size of the last volume, when the next initialization (such as refreshing the page) player reads the cache value

title: isLive‚Äã
content: Type: BooleanDefault: false Use live mode, hide progress bar and play time ‚ñ∂ Run Code var art = new Artplayer({ container: '.artplayer-app', url: '/assets/sample/video.mp4', isLive: true, });

title: muted‚Äã
content: Type: BooleanDefault: false Whether the default mute ‚ñ∂ Run Code var art = new Artplayer({ container: '.artplayer-app', url: '/assets/sample/video.mp4', muted: true, });

title: autoplay‚Äã
content: Type: BooleanDefault: false Whether automatic play ‚ñ∂ Run Code var art = new Artplayer({ container: '.artplayer-app', url: '/assets/sample/video.mp4', autoplay: true, muted: true, });  Tip If you want the default to enter the page, you can automatically play the video, muted must be true, more information, please read Autoplay Policy Changes

title: autoSize‚Äã
content: Type: BooleanDefault: false The size of the player will populate the entire container size, so there is often a black edge, the option can automatically adjust the player size to hide the black side. ‚ñ∂ Run Code // Zoom browser window View effect var art = new Artplayer({ container: '.artplayer-app', url: '/assets/sample/video.mp4', autoSize: true, });

title: autoMini‚Äã
content: Type: BooleanDefault: false When the player scrolls outside the browser viewport, automatically enter the mini play mode ‚ñ∂ Run Code var art = new Artplayer({ container: '.artplayer-app', url: '/assets/sample/video.mp4', autoMini: true, });

title: loop‚Äã
content: Type: BooleanDefault: false Whether loop playing ‚ñ∂ Run Code var art = new Artplayer({ container: '.artplayer-app', url: '/assets/sample/video.mp4', loop: true, });

title: flip‚Äã
content: Type: BooleanDefault: false Whether to display a video flip function, currently appear in the setting panel, so you need to set up setting is True ‚ñ∂ Run Code var art = new Artplayer({ container: '.artplayer-app', url: '/assets/sample/video.mp4', flip: true, setting: true, });

title: playbackRate‚Äã
content: Type: BooleanDefault: false Whether the video playback speed function is displayed, it will appear in the setting panel and contextmenu ‚ñ∂ Run Code var art = new Artplayer({ container: '.artplayer-app', url: '/assets/sample/video.mp4', playbackRate: true, setting: true, });

title: aspectRatio‚Äã
content: Type: BooleanDefault: false Whether to display video long aspect ratio, it will appear in the setting panel and contextmenu ‚ñ∂ Run Code var art = new Artplayer({ container: '.artplayer-app', url: '/assets/sample/video.mp4', aspectRatio: true, setting: true, });

title: screenshot‚Äã
content: Type: BooleanDefault: false Whether to display video screenshots in the bottom control bar ‚ñ∂ Run Code var art = new Artplayer({ container: '.artplayer-app', url: '/assets/sample/video.mp4', screenshot: true, // Optional moreVideoAttr: { crossOrigin: 'anonymous', }, });  Tip Because browser security mechanisms, if video source addresses and websites are cross-domain, screenshot failed

title: setting‚Äã
content: Type: BooleanDefault: false Whether to display the setting panel of the switch button in the bottom control bar ‚ñ∂ Run Code var art = new Artplayer({ container: '.artplayer-app', url: '/assets/sample/video.mp4', setting: true, });

title: hotkey‚Äã
content: Type: BooleanDefault: true Whether to use shortcut keys ‚ñ∂ Run Code var art = new Artplayer({ container: '.artplayer-app', url: '/assets/sample/video.mp4', hotkey: true, });  Hotkey	Describe‚Üë	Increasing volume ‚Üì	lower the volume ‚Üê	Fast forward 5 seconds ‚Üí	Fast backward 5 seconds space	Switch play / pause Tip This hotkey will take effect only after the player gets the focus (if you click on the player).

title: pip‚Äã

title: fullscreen‚Äã
content: Type: BooleanDefault: false Whether to display the full screen button of the player window in the bottom control bar ‚ñ∂ Run Code var art = new Artplayer({ container: '.artplayer-app', url: '/assets/sample/video.mp4', fullscreen: true, });

title: fullscreenWeb‚Äã

title: useSSR‚Äã
content: Type: BooleanDefault: false Whether to use SSR mounting mode, it is useful if you want to render the HTML required by the player in advance before mounting the player You can access the HTML required by the player through Artplayer.html ‚ñ∂ Run Code var $container = document.querySelector('.artplayer-app'); $container.innerHTML = Artplayer.html; var art = new Artplayer({ container: $container, url: '/assets/sample/video.mp4', useSSR: true, });  Tip SSR is the abbreviation of Server Side Render. The content on the page is generated by server side rendering, and the browser directly displays the HTML returned by the server side.

title: playsInline‚Äã

title: layers‚Äã

title: controls‚Äã

title: whitelist‚Äã
content: Type: ArrayDefault: [] Because there are a variety of differences and restrictions in different mobile devices, this player is mount video by default on mobile devices. If you want to use this player on mobile devices, you need to manually open white list. The whitelist is an array type, which matches the window.navigator.userAgent, as long as one of the match is successful, enable the player Support string match, function match, regular match ‚ñ∂ Run Code var art = new Artplayer({ container: '.artplayer-app', url: '/assets/sample/video.mp4', // whitelist: [(ua) => /iPhone OS 11/gi.test(ua)], // whitelist: [/iPhone OS 11/gi], // whitelist: ['iPhone OS 11'], whitelist: ['*'], });  Tip If you want all types of mobile devices to enable players, set the whitelist to wildcard: ['*']

title: ÂéüÁîü‰∫ã‰ª∂‚Äã
content: Êõ¥Â§ö‰ø°ÊÅØËØ∑ÈòÖËØª Mozilla Video Events ‰∫ã‰ª∂ÂêçÂ≠ó	Ëß¶ÂèëÊó∂Èó¥video:canplay	The browser can play the media, but estimates that not enough data has been loaded to play the media up to its end without having to stop for further buffering of content. video:canplaythrough	The browser estimates it can play the media up to its end without stopping for content buffering. video:complete	The rendering of an OfflineAudioContext is terminated. video:durationchange	The duration attribute has been updated. video:emptied	The media has become empty; for example, this event is sent if the media has already been loaded (or partially loaded), and the load() method is called to reload it. video:ended	Playback has stopped because the end of the media was reached. video:loadeddata	The first frame of the media has finished loading. video:loadedmetadata	The metadata has been loaded. video:pause	Playback has been paused. video:play	Playback has begun. video:playing	Playback is ready to start after having been paused or delayed due to lack of data. video:progress	Fired periodically as the browser loads a resource. video:ratechange	The playback rate has changed. video:seeked	A seek operation completed. video:seeking	A seek operation began. video:stalled	The user agent is trying to fetch media data, but data is unexpectedly not forthcoming. video:suspend	Media data loading has been suspended. video:timeupdate	The time indicated by the currentTime attribute has been updated. video:volumechange	The volume has changed. video:waiting	Playback has stopped because of a temporary lack of data ‚ñ∂ Run Code var art = new Artplayer({ container: '.artplayer-app', url: '/assets/sample/video.mp4', }); art.on('video:play', (...args) => { console.info(args); });

content: ‰∏ªÈ°µ: https://github.com/video-dev/hls.js ‚ñ∂ Run Code var art = new Artplayer({ container: '.artplayer-app', autoplay: true, url: 'https://test-streams.mux.dev/x36xhzz/x36xhzz.m3u8', customType: { m3u8: function (video, url) { if (Hls.isSupported()) { const hls = new Hls(); hls.loadSource(url); hls.attachMedia(video); } else { const canPlay = video.canPlayType('application/vnd.apple.mpegurl'); if (canPlay === 'probably' || canPlay === 'maybe') { video.src = url; } else { art.notice.show = '‰∏çÊîØÊåÅÊí≠ÊîæÊ†ºÂºèÔºöm3u8'; } } }, }, });

content: ‚ñ∂ Run Code var art = new Artplayer({ container: '.artplayer-app', url: '/assets/sample/video.mp4', autoSize: true, setting: true, playbackRate: true, fullscreenWeb: true, plugins: [ artplayerPluginDanmuku({ // ÂºπÂπïÊï∞ÁªÑ danmuku: [ { text: '111', // ÂºπÂπïÊñáÊú¨ time: 1, // ÂèëÈÄÅÊó∂Èó¥ÔºåÂçï‰ΩçÁßí color: '#fff', // ÂºπÂπïÂ±ÄÈÉ®È¢úËâ≤ border: false, // ÊòØÂê¶ÊòæÁ§∫ÊèèËæπ mode: 0, // ÂºπÂπïÊ®°Âºè: 0Ë°®Á§∫ÊªöÂä®„ÄÅ1ÈùôÊ≠¢ }, { text: '222', time: 2, color: 'red', border: true, mode: 0, }, { text: '333', time: 3, color: 'green', border: false, mode: 1, }, ], speed: 5, // ÂºπÂπïÊåÅÁª≠Êó∂Èó¥ÔºåÂçï‰ΩçÁßíÔºåËåÉÂõ¥Âú®[1 ~ 10] opacity: 1, // ÂºπÂπïÈÄèÊòéÂ∫¶ÔºåËåÉÂõ¥Âú®[0 ~ 1] fontSize: 25, // Â≠ó‰ΩìÂ§ßÂ∞èÔºåÊîØÊåÅÊï∞Â≠óÂíåÁôæÂàÜÊØî color: '#FFFFFF', // ÈªòËÆ§Â≠ó‰ΩìÈ¢úËâ≤ mode: 0, // ÈªòËÆ§Ê®°ÂºèÔºå0-ÊªöÂä®Ôºå1-ÈùôÊ≠¢ margin: [10, '25%'], // ÂºπÂπï‰∏ä‰∏ãËæπË∑ùÔºåÊîØÊåÅÊï∞Â≠óÂíåÁôæÂàÜÊØî antiOverlap: true, // ÊòØÂê¶Èò≤ÈáçÂè† useWorker: true, // ÊòØÂê¶‰ΩøÁî® web worker synchronousPlayback: false, // ÊòØÂê¶ÂêåÊ≠•Âà∞Êí≠ÊîæÈÄüÂ∫¶ filter: (danmu) => danmu.text.length < 50, // ÂºπÂπïËøáÊª§ÂáΩÊï∞ÔºåËøîÂõû true ÂàôÂèØ‰ª•ÂèëÈÄÅ lockTime: 5, // ËæìÂÖ•Ê°ÜÈîÅÂÆöÊó∂Èó¥ÔºåÂçï‰ΩçÁßíÔºåËåÉÂõ¥Âú®[1 ~ 60] maxLength: 100, // ËæìÂÖ•Ê°ÜÊúÄÂ§ßÂèØËæìÂÖ•ÁöÑÂ≠óÊï∞ÔºåËåÉÂõ¥Âú®[0 ~ 500] minWidth: 200, // ËæìÂÖ•Ê°ÜÊúÄÂ∞èÂÆΩÂ∫¶ÔºåËåÉÂõ¥Âú®[0 ~ 500]ÔºåÂ°´ 0 Âàô‰∏∫Êó†ÈôêÂà∂ maxWidth: 400, // ËæìÂÖ•Ê°ÜÊúÄÂ§ßÂÆΩÂ∫¶ÔºåËåÉÂõ¥Âú®[0 ~ Infinity]ÔºåÂ°´ 0 Âàô‰∏∫ 100% ÂÆΩÂ∫¶ theme: 'dark', // ËæìÂÖ•Ê°ÜËá™ÂÆö‰πâÊåÇËΩΩÊó∂ÁöÑ‰∏ªÈ¢òËâ≤ÔºåÈªòËÆ§‰∏∫ darkÔºåÂèØ‰ª•ÈÄâÂ°´‰∫ÆËâ≤ light beforeEmit: (danmu) => !!danmu.text.trim(), // ÂèëÈÄÅÂºπÂπïÂâçÁöÑËá™ÂÆö‰πâÊ†°È™åÔºåËøîÂõû true ÂàôÂèØ‰ª•ÂèëÈÄÅ // ÈÄöËøá mount ÈÄâÈ°πÂèØ‰ª•Ëá™ÂÆö‰πâËæìÂÖ•Ê°ÜÊåÇËΩΩÁöÑ‰ΩçÁΩÆÔºåÈªòËÆ§ÊåÇËΩΩ‰∫éÊí≠ÊîæÂô®Â∫ïÈÉ®Ôºå‰ªÖÂú®ÂΩìÂÆΩÂ∫¶Â∞è‰∫éÊúÄÂ∞èÂÄºÊó∂ÁîüÊïà // mount: document.querySelector('.artplayer-danmuku'), }), ], });

content: Á±ªÂûã: Function ÈÄöËøáÊñπÊ≥ï hide Âíå show ËøõË°åÈöêËóèÊàñËÄÖÊòæÁ§∫ÂºπÂπï ‚ñ∂ Run Code var art = new Artplayer({ container: '.artplayer-app', url: '/assets/sample/video.mp4', plugins: [ artplayerPluginDanmuku({ danmuku: '/assets/sample/danmuku.xml', }), ], controls: [ { position: 'right', html: 'ÈöêËóèÂºπÂπï', click: function () { art.plugins.artplayerPluginDanmuku.hide(); }, }, { position: 'right', html: 'ÊòæÁ§∫ÂºπÂπï', click: function () { art.plugins.artplayerPluginDanmuku.show(); }, }, ], });

content: Á±ªÂûã: Boolean ÈÄöËøáÂ±ûÊÄß isHide Âà§Êñ≠ÂΩìÂâçÂºπÂπïÊòØÈöêËóèÊàñËÄÖÊòæÁ§∫ ‚ñ∂ Run Code var art = new Artplayer({ container: '.artplayer-app', url: '/assets/sample/video.mp4', plugins: [ artplayerPluginDanmuku({ danmuku: '/assets/sample/danmuku.xml', }), ], controls: [ { position: 'right', html: 'ÈöêËóèÂºπÂπï', click: function (_, event) { if (art.plugins.artplayerPluginDanmuku.isHide) { art.plugins.artplayerPluginDanmuku.show(); event.target.innerText = 'ÈöêËóèÂºπÂπï'; } else { art.plugins.artplayerPluginDanmuku.hide(); event.target.innerText = 'ÊòæÁ§∫ÂºπÂπï'; } }, }, ], });

content: Á±ªÂûã: Function ÈÄöËøáÊñπÊ≥ï config ÂÆûÊó∂ÊîπÂèòÂºπÂπïÈÖçÁΩÆÔºåÊîØÊåÅÂ±ûÊÄßÊúâÔºö danmukuspeedopacityfontSizecolormodemarginantiOverlapsynchronousPlaybackfilterlockTimebeforeEmit ‚ñ∂ Run Code var art = new Artplayer({ container: '.artplayer-app', url: '/assets/sample/video.mp4', plugins: [ artplayerPluginDanmuku({ danmuku: '/assets/sample/danmuku.xml', }), ], controls: [ { position: 'right', html: 'ÂºπÂπïÂ§ßÂ∞èÔºö<input type="range" min="12" max="50" step="1" value="25">', style: { display: 'flex', alignItems: 'center', }, mounted: function ($setting) { const $range = $setting.querySelector('input[type=range]'); $range.addEventListener('change', () => { art.plugins.artplayerPluginDanmuku.config({ fontSize: Number($range.value), }); }); }, }, ], });

title: Â§ÑÁêÜÂçï‰∏™ÁªÑ‰ª∂
content: Â§ÑÁêÜÂçï‰∏™ÁªÑ‰ª∂ ÂΩìÊàë‰ª¨Âú®layers„ÄÅcontextmenu„ÄÅcontrolsÈáåÊ∑ªÂä†Ëá™ÂÆö‰πâÁªÑ‰ª∂Êó∂ÔºåÊúÄÂ•ΩÂ∏¶‰∏ä‰∏Ä‰∏™ÂîØ‰∏ÄÁöÑ name Â±ûÊÄßÔºåËØ•Â±ûÊÄß‰∏ç‰ΩÜ‰ºö‰Ωú‰∏∫Á±ªÂêçÊ∑ªÂä†Âà∞ dom ÂÖÉÁ¥†ÈáåÔºåËøòÂèØ‰ª•Áî®‰∫éÂø´ÈÄüÂÆö‰ΩçÂà∞ÁªÑ‰ª∂„ÄÇ ËøôÈáåÊúâ‰∏âÁßçÊñπÊ≥ïËé∑ÂèñÁªÑ‰ª∂ÁöÑdomÂÖÉÁ¥†ÔºöÁªÑ‰ª∂ÊñπÊ≥ï mounted„ÄÅÂÆû‰æãÊñπÊ≥ï query„ÄÅÊé®ËçêÈÄöËøá name Áõ¥Êé•Ëé∑Âèñ ‚ñ∂ Run Code var art = new Artplayer({ container: '.artplayer-app', url: '/assets/sample/video.mp4', setting: true, }); art.on('ready', () => { art.layers.add({ name: 'layer1', html: 'your-layer', mounted: function($layer1) { // } }); art.contextmenu.add({ name: 'contextmenu1', html: 'your-contextmenu', mounted: function($contextmenu1) { // } }); art.controls.add({ name: 'control1', html: 'your-control', position: 'right', mounted: function($control1) { // } }); // ‰ΩøÁî®Êü•ËØ¢ query Ëé∑ÂèñÁªÑ‰ª∂ÁöÑDOMÂÖÉÁ¥† var $layer1 = art.query('.art-layer-layer1'); var $contextmenu1 = art.query('.art-contextmenu-contextmenu1'); var $control1 = art.query('.art-control-control1'); // Êé®Ëçê‰ΩøÁî® name Ëé∑ÂèñÁªÑ‰ª∂ÁöÑDOMÂÖÉÁ¥† var $layer1 = art.layers['layer1']; var $contextmenu1 = art.contextmenu['contextmenu1']; var $control1 = art.controls['control1']; }); ÊèêÁ§∫ Ê≥®ÊÑèÔºå‰Ω†‰∏çËÉΩÂàõÂª∫Â≠òÂú®Áõ∏ÂêåÂêçÂ≠óÁöÑÁªÑ‰ª∂

title: ‰∏é React Portal ‰ΩøÁî®
content: ‰∏é React Portal ‰ΩøÁî® Âú® layers„ÄÅcontextmenu„ÄÅcontrols Èáå‰ΩøÁî® react ÁªÑ‰ª∂‰πüÊòØÈùûÂ∏∏ÂÆπÊòìÁöÑ‰∫ãÔºåÈÄöËøá createPortal Â§ÑÁêÜÊõ¥Â§çÊùÇÁöÑ‰∏öÂä°ÈÄªËæë üëâ ÁÇπÂáªÊâìÂºÄÂú®Á∫øÊºîÁ§∫ import React, { useState, useEffect } from "react"; import ReactDOM, { createPortal } from "react-dom"; import Artplayer from "artplayer/examples/react/Artplayer"; function Timer({ time }) { return <div>{time}</div>; } function App() { const [art, setArt] = useState(null); const [time, setTime] = useState(0); useEffect(() => { const update = () => setTime((time) => time + 1); setInterval(update, 1000); }, []); return ( <div> <Artplayer option={{ url: "https://artplayer.org/assets/sample/video.mp4", layers: [ { html: "", name: "portal" } ], controls: [ { position: "right", name: "portal", html: "" } ] }} style={{ width: "600px", height: "400px", margin: "60px auto 0" }} getInstance={(art) => { art.on("ready", () => setArt(art)); }} /> {art ? createPortal(<Timer time={time} />, art.layers.portal) : null} {art ? createPortal(<Timer time={time} />, art.controls.portal) : null} </div> ); } const rootElement = document.getElementById("root"); ReactDOM.render(<App />, rootElement);

content: Á±ªÂûã: ArrayÈªòËÆ§: [] ÂàùÂßãÂåñËá™ÂÆö‰πâÁöÑ‰∏öÂä°ÂõæÂ±Ç Â±ûÊÄß	Á±ªÂûã	ÊèèËø∞disable	Boolean	ÊòØÂê¶Á¶ÅÁî®ÁªÑ‰ª∂ name	String	ÁªÑ‰ª∂ÂîØ‰∏ÄÂêçÁß∞ÔºåÁî®‰∫éÊ†áËÆ∞Á±ªÂêç index	Number	ÁªÑ‰ª∂Á¥¢ÂºïÔºåÁî®‰∫éÊòæÁ§∫ÁöÑ‰ºòÂÖàÁ∫ß html	String„ÄÅElement	ÁªÑ‰ª∂ÁöÑ DOM ÂÖÉÁ¥† style	Object	ÁªÑ‰ª∂Ê†∑ÂºèÂØπË±° click	Function	ÁªÑ‰ª∂ÁÇπÂáª‰∫ã‰ª∂ mounted	Function	ÁªÑ‰ª∂ÊåÇËΩΩÂêéËß¶Âèë tooltip	String	ÁªÑ‰ª∂ÁöÑÊèêÁ§∫ÊñáÊú¨ ‚ñ∂ Run Code var img = '/assets/sample/layer.png'; var art = new Artplayer({ container: '.artplayer-app', url: '/assets/sample/video.mp4', layers: [ { index: 1, name: 'potser', disable: false, html: `<img style="width: 100px" src="${img}">`, style: { position: 'absolute', top: '20px', right: '20px', opacity: '.9', }, click: function (...args) { console.info('‰Ω†ÁÇπÂáª‰∫ÜÁªÑ‰ª∂'); art.layers.show = false; }, mounted: function (...args) { console.info('ÁªÑ‰ª∂ÊåÇËΩΩÂÆåÊàê'); }, }, ], });

content: Á±ªÂûã: ArrayÈªòËÆ§: [] ÂàùÂßãÂåñËá™ÂÆö‰πâÁöÑÂ∫ïÈÉ®ÊéßÂà∂Ê†è Â±ûÊÄß	Á±ªÂûã	ÊèèËø∞disable	Boolean	ÊòØÂê¶Á¶ÅÁî®ÁªÑ‰ª∂ name	String	ÁªÑ‰ª∂ÂîØ‰∏ÄÂêçÁß∞ÔºåÁî®‰∫éÊ†áËÆ∞Á±ªÂêç index	Number	ÁªÑ‰ª∂Á¥¢ÂºïÔºåÁî®‰∫éÊòæÁ§∫ÁöÑ‰ºòÂÖàÁ∫ß html	String„ÄÅElement	ÁªÑ‰ª∂ÁöÑ DOM ÂÖÉÁ¥† style	Object	ÁªÑ‰ª∂Ê†∑ÂºèÂØπË±° click	Function	ÁªÑ‰ª∂ÁÇπÂáª‰∫ã‰ª∂ mounted	Function	ÁªÑ‰ª∂ÊåÇËΩΩÂêéËß¶Âèë tooltip	String	ÁªÑ‰ª∂ÁöÑÊèêÁ§∫ÊñáÊú¨ position	String	‰ΩçÁΩÆÂú® left ÊàñËÄÖ right ‚ñ∂ Run Code var art = new Artplayer({ container: '.artplayer-app', url: '/assets/sample/video.mp4', controls: [ { disable: false, name: 'button', index: 10, position: 'right', html: 'Ëá™ÂÆö‰πâÊåâÈíÆ', tooltip: 'Ëá™ÂÆö‰πâÊåâÈíÆÁöÑÊèêÁ§∫1', style: { color: 'red', }, click: function () { console.log('‰Ω†ÁÇπÂáª‰∫ÜËá™ÂÆö‰πâÊåâÈíÆ1'); }, mounted: function () { console.log('Ëá™ÂÆö‰πâÊåâÈíÆÊåÇËΩΩÂÆåÊàê1'); }, }, { position: 'left', html: 'Ëá™ÂÆö‰πâÊåâÈíÆ2', tooltip: 'Ëá™ÂÆö‰πâÊåâÈíÆÁöÑÊèêÁ§∫2', style: { color: 'green', }, click: function () { console.log('‰Ω†ÁÇπÂáª‰∫ÜËá™ÂÆö‰πâÊåâÈíÆ2'); }, }, ], });

'ÂºÄÂêØ' : 'ÂÖ≥Èó≠'; // ÊîπÂèòÊåâÈíÆÁä∂ÊÄÅ return nextState; }, }, { html: 'ÂíåÂàóË°®ÁªÑÂêà', width: 200, selector: [ { default: true, html: 'ËÆæÁΩÆ 01', }, { html: 'ËÆæÁΩÆ 02', }, { html: 'ËÆæÁΩÆ 03', switch: false, onSwitch: function (item, $dom, event) { return !item.switch; }, }, { html: 'ËÆæÁΩÆ 04', icon: '', switch: true, onSwitch: function (item, $dom, event) { return !item.switch; }, }, ], onSelect: function (item) { return item.html; }, }, ], });
